instruction: Create a social media post to promote a store offering discounts during holiday season.
output: It's the most wonderful time of the year...and we're offering big discounts at Joe's Outlet! For the rest of the holiday season, save up to 55% on shoes and apparel. Hurry in and stock up on gifts for your friends and family (or treat yourself!) before the deals are gone! #JoesOutlet #HolidayDeals
